data.eml:eml: A new genus and species of troglobitic ground beetle from eastern Guizhou, Southwest China (Coleoptera: Carabidae: Trechinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhao, Danyang, Tian, Mingyi (2016): A new genus and species of troglobitic ground beetle from eastern Guizhou, Southwest China (Coleoptera: Carabidae: Trechinae). Zootaxa 4097 (3): 434-441, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4097.3.11
